rulesStrings.li: tale_noun->The time [PAWN_nameDef] became the highest living thing in the universe.
image->[PAWN_nameFull] is [do_gerund] [circumstance_group]. The universe is [do_gerund] [circumstance_group]. [title_sentence]
image->[PAWN_nameFull] [do_gerund] [circumstance_group]. A field of shrooms are growing [circumstance_group]. [title_sentence]
image->[PAWN_nameFull] [do_gerund] [circumstance_group]. An array of rouge galaxies are [do_gerund] [circumstance_group]. [title_sentence]
image->[PAWN_nameFull] [do_gerund] [circumstance_group]. An old man and a cat are fighting in the background to signify the thin line between good and evil. [title_sentence]
circumstance_phrase->with total concentration
circumstance_phrase->with a look of satisfaction on [PAWN_possessive] face
circumstance_phrase->at [PAWN_possessive] work bench
circumstance_phrase->with great intensity
do_gerund->floating
do_gerund->flying
do_gerund->looking on
do_gerund->swimming
do_gerund->navigating
circumstance_phrase->through the cosmos
circumstance_phrase->on the edge of the universe
circumstance_phrase->through the 9th dimension
circumstance_phrase->in space
circumstance_phrase->in a wormhole
circumstance_phrase->through the center of the universe
desc_sentence->God is walking beside [PAWN_pronoun].
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is having a conversation with God.
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] has morphed into the body of an ophanim angel.
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is rendered in an exaggerated way to appear more powerful.
desc_sentence->The size of the galaxy is exaggerated to emphasize its importance.
desc_sentence->[PAWN_possessive] face has an artistic glow added to it. It seems almost angelic.
desc_sentence->God is faded into the background to emphasize [PAWN_possessive] legendary accomplishment.
desc_sentence->Onlookering creatures from the 17th dimension surround [PAWN_objective] in awe of [PAWN_possessive] wisdom.
desc_sentence->A crowd cheers from the background
title_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef] is laughing uncontrollably.
title_sentence->grapefruits symbolically surround [PAWN_nameDef] head.
title_sentence->The key to the universe is sitting on a shelf in the background.
